A '''book''' is an [[item]] that can be used as a [[crafting]] material, or to store [[enchantment]]s in [[Enchanted Book|a form]] that can be applied to any valid item using an [[anvil]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Block loot ===
Three books are dropped when a [[bookshelf]] is broken without using [[Silk Touch]] or [[fire]].

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|book}}

=== Crafting ===
{{crafting
|Paper
|Paper
|Paper
|Leather
|Output= Book
|type= Miscellaneous
}}

=== Grindstones ===
Disenchanting an [[enchanted book]] at a [[grindstone]] yields a normal book and a small amount of experience (unless the enchanted book has a [[Curse of Binding]] or a [[Curse of Vanishing]] on it).

=== Villager gifts ===
{{in|java}}, librarian [[villagers]] throw books at players under the [[Hero of the Village]] effect.

== Usage ==
=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage}}

=== Chiseled bookshelf ===
{{control|Use|text=Using}} the [[chiseled bookshelf]] while having a book in the main hand puts the book inside the chiseled bookshelf.

=== Enchanting ===
Books can be made into [[enchanted book]]s by enchanting them on [[enchanting table]]s.
